text: Musa bin Mohamad (29 November 1943 â€“ 8 June 2024) was a Malaysian politician who served on the UMNO Supreme Council from 2000 to 2003. Appointed as a Senator in 1999 by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad, Mohamad later served as Minister of Education from 1999 to 2004 under Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi. He died on 8 June 2024 at the age of 80 due to multiple myeloma. == References == Category:Malaysian politicians Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Musa Mohamad
